explanation: The five pillars of Islam are Shahada (declaration of faith), Salah (prayer), Zakat (charity), Sawm (fasting), and Hajj (pilgrimage).
Muslims are required to pray five times a day: Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha.
Ramadan is the 9th month of the Islamic calendar and the month of fasting.
Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) was born in Mecca in the year 570 CE.
